name: Cheese Chase (BlueJackalope)
description:
Patreon Twitter Discord

Guide the best cheese thief in the world in one of his usual robberies. Run, jump, pounce and a lot more to get the cheese and avoid the electerrifying guard bots!

Game Idea & Character by @RattyKai
Music from Visager's "Songs from an Unmade World 2"

Have fun!
